title: Help me I can't log on League of Legend

replies.body:
Hey THeXLengend!

When you encounter Login Issues, it can sometimes be pretty tricky to identify what the root cause is because there are two primary different reasons for why it fails:

1) There is a problem with your computer rejecting the security certificates from our servers and/or misconfigured Internet Explorer/Safari settings

2) Your computer is unable to establish a consistent connection with our PvP.net Servers (the client)

Without going in-depth into your logs, it is fairly difficult to determine which might be the issue you are experiencing.  Because of this, I will provide some information that should help for both!

First, in order to make sure that there aren't any certificate or IE/Safari settings, follow all of the steps in this Knowledge Base Article:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944-Login-Issues

It will walk you through in-depth steps to ensure that your computer is properly configured for League of Legends.  Every step is extremely important, so don't skip over any!

Secondly, if you are still experiencing these errors, it might be due to a larger connection issue where your computer cannot connect to our Servers.  To that end, try all of the steps in this guide:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues

There are quite a bit of steps here, but make sure that you complete all of them so we can rule these out as a possible root cause.

If everything is returning this same haunting error message that brings you to a boiling rage, don't smash just yet!  Make sure to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to our Tech Team!  They can help you investigate this issue much more in-depth, and provide some specific troubleshooting steps.  If you do submit a ticket, include the following:

1) Network Analysis:  https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq1

2) Network Information Log:  https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq4

3) A Process List:  https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq3

Well heres another issue.. I can type and describe my problem on submit a ticket page, but when I try to submit my ticket it shows me 'Webpage is not available' Hope you don't mind if i post here. If u need my email to send me the solution could u notify me here?

Recently whenever I open LoL, either 2 of these messages pop out.
'Unspecified error occurred, please check the logs for more info'
'did not receive a response from the server (retrying 123) n failed)

I have read many threads on how to solve the problem but still can't solve it. I have tried DNS flush, and used the google DNS 8.8.8.8 and the other numbers but still fail to be able to connect to LoL, I made sure my firewall wasn't affecting. Right now I have Google Chrome and Safari on my computer only, and I am using a MacBook Pro Version 10.9.5

I am currently faced with 2 problems.
1. After trying so many ways, I made a foolish mistake and tried unistalling and reinstalling LoL. However, when I tried to download the client again and visit the download webpage, it comes up with 'The Webpage is not available'  (Just to clarify I mainly use Google Chrome) even though I can access other websites. I have tried resetting my router but nothing seems to work. So right now, I cannot download the client until I can access the page where I get to download the LoL Client. i read on different threads that others have the same problem as me.

2. I cant connect to LoL, it frustrates me a bit as I cant find a solution and when I went to my friends house yesterday, I was able to access the LoL server and my account when I used his computer, his computer is a Windows.

Anyways hope Riot can fix the problem! Thanks for being generous for the free mystery skin!

Just to confirm after reading your post...

You mentioned that the download page refuses to appear.  However, were you able to view the Knowledge Base Articles that I linked?  Were you able to complete every single step found in those articles?

If not, can you try using [this VPN](http://www.hotspotshield.com/) to see if your issue gets resolved?

Lastly, if all else continues to fail, can you let me know what ISP you are currently using?

Using the VPN you provided me with, I'm able to at least visit the LoL website and download the client. I haven't played on my account yet, it seems like theres an upcoming patch at 3.00PST. 

I do have one qns....
The VPN you have provided me with, it says that I'm on a 1 day free trial.. So what happens tomorrow?

Since everything works while using a VPN, it appears that the root cause of the issue is on your local connection provided by your ISP.  Switching to a Public DNS and also flushing your DNS should resolve these issues, and it is incredibly odd that it persists beyond that.

If you have double-checked that you completed these steps properly, [make sure to submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  One of our Tech Specialists should be able to investigate further and help look into it.  Make sure you provide what ISP you are connecting to as well!

I think I'm facing another problem now...
I reinstalled LoL and waited for the launcher to get the patch 5.1
However, my computer starts to slow down the patching speed when it reaches around 33-40% and I can't finish patching up till 100% even in 2 hours. There are other times when I just go off for a while (approx 10 mins afk) and when I touch my computer again, I realised that the LoL Launcher had just closed by itself, and I need to start patching all over from 0% again, I'm not sure what the problem is and how big LoL is, my Mac has 167 GB of space free so I;m hoping that you can help me >_

This does seem extremely odd....hmmm...the best course is to [submit a ticket ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)still.  This is going to require much more in-depth troubleshooting to resolve, and the best place to do this is in a one-on-one setting!

Hey there! After about a week I finally fixed my problem! I just came back here to thank you for your effort to help me. Without your help, I wouldn't know what to do with my computer and get a VPN so I would just like to say you have been doing an excellent job in helping the players and fans and I appreciate it a lot. Keep up the good work! :D

-MeGusta43
I appreciate the kind words, but I'm just doing what I can to help is all.  Feel free to let us know if you experience any other issues!
HotspotShield is free to use. You are likely using the Elite trial, so you'll still be able to use the free VPN after the trial expires.
For some reason I can't access support.riotgames I live in singapore btw

Same here, and just to clarify.. its not because of where we live, my friends are still able to play and log in. 
I cant access the league LoL download page too and support page

I found this solution for win7 hope it works for you ^^ if not then meh~ :/ can't do anything 





If your having an error similar to this:

http://apollo-na-uploads.s3.amazonaws.com/1420795095323/ScreenShot2015-01-09at5.13.59pm.png

When you know your internet is working perfectly. This will usually occur when you have recently used a proxy, It can be confusing because you might have disabled or uninstalled the proxy server but the error still occurs.

Go to network and sharing center

Search for internet options on the top right search panel

Click on internet options

Click on connections tab (top list)

Click on lAN settings

Check the 'automatically detect settings' box.
bump...where are you Riot? Major problem for a lot of us.
